price: 43. Waxaana dhab ahaan siinnay Muuse Kitaabka (Towraadda) kaddib markaan halaagnay qaaruumihii hore, isagoo tusmooyin u ah dadka, iyo hanuun iyo naxariis inay xusuustaan (oo ku waantoobaan).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ بَصَآئِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba min baʿdi mā ahlaknā al-qurūna al-ūlā baṣāira lilnnāsi wahudan waraḥmatan laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
